text: The mind is a river; let it flow, and it will find peace.
author: Rumha

text: To walk the path of virtue is to carry no burden.
author: Rumha

text: In silence, the soul whispers its truest desires.
author: Rumha

text: A single step begins the journey of a thousand lives.
author: Rumha

text: Desire is the wind; wisdom is the anchor.
author: Rumha

text: What you seek is already within, like a lotus in the mud.
author: Rumha

text: The wise man bends like bamboo, unbroken by the storm.
author: Rumha

text: Happiness is not a gift received, but a garden cultivated.
author: Rumha

text: The wheel turns for all; cling not to its spokes.
author: Rumha

text: To know the self is to know the universe in a grain of sand.
author: Rumha

text: Words are shadows; actions are the light.
author: Rumha

text: The fool chases the horizon; the sage sits and sees it come.
author: Rumha

text: Sorrow is a teacher, and peace is its lesson.
author: Rumha

text: Harmony is the music of a heart at rest.
author: Rumha

text: The tree grows tall by rooting deep, not by reaching high.
author: Rumha

text: Ignorance binds; understanding sets free.
author: Rumha

text: Life is a mirror; reflect kindness, and it shines back.
author: Rumha

text: The breath is a thread, tying the moment to eternity.
author: Rumha

text: To give without want is the root of all riches.
author: Rumha

text: The mountain stands still, yet teaches us to move.
author: Rumha

text: Truth is a lamp; doubt is but a fleeting shadow.
author: Rumha

text: He who masters patience masters the world.
author: Rumha

text: The drop joins the ocean, yet remains itself.
author: Rumha

text: A pure heart sees through the dust of illusion.
author: Rumha

text: The wise live as if each day were a borrowed gift.
author: Rumha

text: The flame burns brightest when fed by stillness.
author: Rumha

text: To judge is to build a wall; to understand is to open a gate.
author: Rumha

text: The river does not rush, yet reaches the sea.
author: Rumha

text: A closed fist holds nothing; an open hand receives all.
author: Rumha

text: Time is a circle, not a line; every end is a beginning.
author: Rumha

text: The seed knows not its flower, yet it grows.
author: Rumha

text: Anger is a cloud; let it pass, and the sky clears.
author: Rumha

text: The heart that listens hears beyond words.
author: Rumha

text: One who seeks power over others has lost it within.
author: Rumha

text: The moon reflects the sun, as the wise reflect truth.
author: Rumha

text: Struggle is the forge where patience is shaped.
author: Rumha

text: To chase the wind is folly; to ride it is wisdom.
author: Rumha

text: The smallest pebble ripples the greatest lake.
author: Rumha

text: Fear is a shadow cast by the light of the unknown.
author: Rumha

text: A thousand steps begin with the courage to stand.
author: Rumha

text: The mind that grasps at nothing holds everything.
author: Rumha

text: Honor is not taken; it is grown from within.
author: Rumha

text: The lotus blooms above the water, rooted in the unseen.
author: Rumha

text: Words carve the world; silence shapes the soul.
author: Rumha

text: The sage plants trees whose shade he will not enjoy.
author: Rumha

text: To see the stars, one must embrace the night.
author: Rumha

text: The body is a guest; the spirit is the host.
author: Rumha

text: Kindness is a bridge over the river of suffering.
author: Rumha

text: The fool counts his gold; the wise count their breaths.
author: Rumha

text: In the dance of opposites, balance is the rhythm.
author: Rumha

text: The sun will rise again.
author: Rumha
